meanings.definition: The hard outer covering of an egg
meanings.sent1: The little chick hatched from the egg shells.
meanings.sent2: She carefully cracked the shells to make breakfast.
meanings.sent3: Why did the egg shells go to school? To become egg-cited learners!
meanings.sent4: The fragile shells protected the life within like a fortress.
meanings.sent5: The shells were as white as snow, gleaming in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A projectile fired from a gun
meanings.sent1: The soldier loaded the shells into the gun.
meanings.sent2: The loud bang echoed through the valley as the shells were fired.
meanings.sent3: Why did the shells refuse to be shot? They wanted to stay safe and sound!
meanings.sent4: The shells flew through the air like tiny, deadly birds.
meanings.sent5: The shells tore through the enemy lines, unstoppable in their path.

meanings.definition: A container typically used for holding liquids
meanings.sent1: She poured the milk into the shells.
meanings.sent2: The shells were filled with water for the thirsty travelers.
meanings.sent3: Why did the shells gossip at the party? They were full of juicy secrets!
meanings.sent4: The shells overflowed with happiness as they held the precious liquid.
meanings.sent5: The shells clinked together, creating a soothing melody of refreshment.

meanings.sent1: The restaurant served delicious shells for dinner.
meanings.sent2: She savored the taste of the buttery shells.
meanings.sent3: Why did the shells throw a party? They wanted to celebrate their shell-fish nature!
meanings.sent4: The shells danced in the pan, releasing their oceanic aroma.
meanings.sent5: The shells were a delicacy, bringing the taste of the sea to the table.

meanings.definition: A protective covering for electronic devices
meanings.sent1: He bought a new phone case with vibrant shells on it.
meanings.sent2: The shells shielded the device from scratches and damage.
meanings.sent3: Why did the shells become friends with the phone? They wanted to protect its shell-f!
meanings.sent4: The shells embraced the phone snugly, like a cozy hug.
meanings.sent5: The shells added a touch of style and safety to the electronic gadget.
